_header: The great sentence I write thee here
Subjects: introductions, to prose texts; epilogues, to prose texts; liturgical texts; excommunication
_description: The Method of pronouncing sentence of Excommunication — in prose with a preface of twelve rhyming lines and ten rhyming lines at the conclusion

BLCottClauAII.First Lines:
Þe grete sentens I wryte þe hereÞat foure tymes in
                    þe ȝere
BLCottClauAII.Last Lines:
…ssepelle hit reddely for noȝt þu wondeÞat alle
                    men þe vndurstande
